data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Nasirabad, Baluchistan, Pakistan. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Nasirabad, Baluchistan, Pakistan
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Nasirabad, Baluchistan, Pakistan. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.section_summary: On average, 120 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Nasirabad, Baluchistan, Pakistan.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Nasirabad, Baluchistan, Pakistan.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Nasirabad, Baluchistan, Pakistan to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Bedar Kashmir (Muslim traditions) people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Bedar Kashmir (Muslim traditions) people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Bedar Kashmir (Muslim traditions) people is yours.
Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the county of Nasirabad. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the county of Nasirabad to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Nasirabad, Baluchistan, Pakistan from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.
